snippet: At least two county clerks in Colorado began issuing marriage permits to same-sex couples on Monday, hours after the U.S. Supreme Court let stand several lower-court opinions declaring bans on gay matrimony in five other states unconstitutional....

headline.print_headline: Colorado Clerks Begin Issuing Gay Marriage Licenses
headline.main: Colorado Clerks Begin Issuing Gay Marriage Licenses

lead_paragraph: At least two county clerks in Colorado began issuing marriage permits to same-sex couples on Monday, hours after the U.S. Supreme Court let stand several lower-court opinions declaring bans on gay matrimony in five other states unconstitutional.
